alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gilchrist, Bradford, Alachua, north central Marion, southwestern Union, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort White, or 8 miles south of Ichetucknee Spring, moving southeast at 30 mph. Additional strong thunderstorm development is expected near US-301 in Alachua County over the next hour. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Starke, Lake Butler, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Citra, Columbia, Alachua, High Springs and Hawthorne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua; Western Marion
